msg: moving log of CVS passfile info down to verbose

author: robbinspg
msg: TUSCANY-534 Release build for calculator sample on win32

author: stevel
msg: This is a little bit of fun; something asked for on the mail list. You can now use -main to specify a new entry point for ant, so if you override ant.Main with a subclass, you can switch to that.
It has a side effect of making ant a generic launcher of things; anything that implements AntMain.startAnt.

author: stevel
msg: oh, this feels so good. Removing Win98 as a supported platform. Also adding an example from a bugrep on how to run ant from ant itself
